Apache Ant(TM) version 1.9.4 compiled on April 29 2014

[root@localhost ~]# cat build.xml                                       
<project name="LS" default="ls" basedir=".">                            
<description>                                                           
LS ant build file                                                       
</description>                                                          
                                                                        
<target name="ls">                                                      
<exec executable="ls" dir="${basedir}" failonerror="true"               
logerror="true">                                                        
<redirector output="/root/ls.txt" error="ls.err" alwayslog="true"/>     
<arg value="-l"/>                                                       
<arg value="/usr/bin"/>                                                 
</exec>                                                                 
</target>                                                               
</project>                                                              
[root@localhost ~]# ant -f build.xml                                    
Buildfile: /root/build.xml                                              
...

Linux miluvl100 2.6.32-279.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Jun 13 18:24:36 EDT 2012 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
bash-4.1$ java -version

Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.72-b04, mixed mode)
bash-4.1$ ant -version
Apache Ant(TM) version 1.9.6 compiled on June 29 2015

Was able to reproduce truncation, slight change to build script where
<redirector output="/root/ls.txt" error="ls.err" alwayslog="true"/>
changed to
<redirector output="ls.txt" error="ls.err" alwayslog="true"/>
A fix for this has been committed upstream and should be available in 1.9.10 and 1.10.2 releases.
